name: Still Alice
synopsis: A linguistics professor and her family find their bonds tested when she is diagnosed with Alzheimers Disease.

name: Blue Jasmine
synopsis: A New York socialite deeply troubled and in denial arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million but isnt bringing money peace or love...

name: Silver Linings Playbook
synopsis: After a stint in a mental institution former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

name: The Iron Lady
synopsis: An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life from girlhood to British prime minister intervene.

name: Black Swan
synopsis: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovskys "Swan Lake" only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.

name: The Blind Side
synopsis: The story of Michael Oher a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

name: The Reader
synopsis: Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.

name: La vie en rose
synopsis: The life story of singer Édith Piaf.

name: The Queen
synopsis: After the death of Princess Diana Queen Elizabeth II struggles with her reaction to a sequence of events nobody could have predicted.

name: Walk the Line
synopsis: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cashs life from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley Jerry Lee Lewis and Carl Perkins.

name: Million Dollar Baby
synopsis: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

name: Monster
synopsis: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

name: The Hours
synopsis: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women all of whom in one way or another have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

name: Monster's Ball
synopsis: After a family tragedy a racist prison guard reexamines his attitudes while falling in love with the African American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

name: Erin Brockovich
synopsis: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a citys water supply.

name: Boys Don't Cry
synopsis: Female born Teena Brandon adopts his male identity of Brandon Teena and attempts to find himself and love in Nebraska.

name: Shakespeare in Love
synopsis: A young Shakespeare out of ideas and short of cash meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

name: As Good As It Gets
synopsis: A single mother/waitress a misanthropic author and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is in an accident.

name: Fargo
synopsis: Jerry Lundegaards inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmens bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

name: Dead Man Walking
synopsis: A nun while comforting a convicted killer on death row empathizes with both the killer and his victims families.

name: Blue Sky
synopsis: Jessica Lange stars in a period drama about a family moving to a military base and she quickly becomes part of a cover-up involving nuclear bomb tests.

name: The Piano
synopsis: A mute woman along with her young daughter and her prized piano are sent to 1850s New Zealand for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner and shes soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

name: Howards End
synopsis: A businessman thwarts his wifes bequest of an estate to another woman.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
synopsis: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

name: Misery
synopsis: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

name: Driving Miss Daisy
synopsis: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

name: The Accused
synopsis: After a young woman suffers a brutal rape in a bar one night a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

name: Moonstruck
synopsis: Loretta Castorini a book keeper from Brooklyn New York finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

name: Children of a Lesser God
synopsis: James is a new speech teacher at a school for the deaf. He falls for Sarah a pupil who decided to stay on at the school rather than venture into the big bad world. She shuns him at first ...                See full summary »

name: The Trip to Bountiful
synopsis: In 1940s Texas an elderly woman is determined to visit her childhood home for one last time.

name: Places in the Heart
synopsis: In 1930s Southern US a widow and her family try to run their cotton farm with the help of a disparate group of friends.

name: Terms of Endearment
synopsis: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love and her daughters family problems.

name: Sophie's Choice
synopsis: After spending time with his new neighbors an aspiring writer realizes they are harboring deep secrets that will forever change him.

name: On Golden Pond
synopsis: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy the son of Chelseas new boyfriend and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

name: Coal Miner's Daughter
synopsis: Biographical story of Loretta Lynn a legendary country singer that came from poverty to worldwide fame. She rose from humble beginnings in Kentucky to superstardom and changing the sound and style of country music forever.

name: Norma Rae
synopsis: A young single mother and textile worker agrees to help unionize her mill despite the problems and dangers involved.

name: Coming Home
synopsis: A woman whose husband is fighting in Vietnam falls in love with another man who suffered a paralyzing combat injury there.

name: Annie Hall
synopsis: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.

name: Network
synopsis: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchors ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
synopsis: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

name: Alice Doesn't Live Here Anymore
synopsis: A recently widowed woman is on the road with her precocious young son determined to make a new life for herself as a singer.

name: A Touch of Class
synopsis: Romantic comedy about a pair of clandestine lovers in a London-Spain tryst.

name: Cabaret
synopsis: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

name: Klute
synopsis: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

name: Women in Love
synopsis: The battle of the sexes and relationships among the elite of Britians industrial Midlands in the 1920s. Gerald Crich and Rupert Berkin are best friends who fall in love with a pair of ...                See full summary »

name: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
synopsis: A headstrong young teacher in a private school in 1930s Edinburgh ignores the curriculum and influences her impressionable 12 year old charges with her over-romanticized world view.

name: The Lion in Winter
synopsis: 1183 AD: King Henry IIs three sons all want to inherit the throne but he wont commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force him.

name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
synopsis: A couples attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.

name: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
synopsis: A bitter aging couple with the help of alcohol use a young couple to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other.

name: Darling
synopsis: A beautiful but amoral model sleeps her way to the top of the London fashion scene at the height of the Swinging Sixties.

name: Mary Poppins
synopsis: A magic nanny comes to work for a cold bankers unhappy family.

name: Hud
synopsis: Hud Bannon is a ruthless young man who tarnishes everything and everyone he touches. Hud represents the perfect embodiment of alienated youth out for kicks with no regard for the ...                See full summary »

name: The Miracle Worker
synopsis: The story of Anne Sullivans struggle to teach the blind and deaf Helen Keller how to communicate.

name: Two Women
synopsis: In the Italy of WWII a widow and her lonely daughter seek for distance between them and the horrors of war.

name: Butterfield 8
synopsis: The romantic life of a fashionable Manhattan beauty whos part model part call-girl--and all man-trap.

name: Room at the Top
synopsis: An ambitious young accountant schemes to wed a wealthy factory owners daughter despite falling in love with a married older woman.

name: I Want to Live!
synopsis: A prostitute sentenced to death for murder pleads her innocence.

name: The Three Faces of Eve
synopsis: A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder.

name: Anastasia
synopsis: An opportunistic Russian businessman tries to pass a mysterious impostor as the Grand Duchess Anastasia. But she is so convincing in her performance that even the biggest skeptics believe her.

name: The Rose Tattoo
synopsis: An Italian-American neighborhood in Louisiana is disturbed when truck driver Rosario Delle Rose is killed by police while smuggling. His buxom widow Serafina miscarries then over a period ...                See full summary »

name: The Country Girl
synopsis: A director hires an alcoholic has-been and strikes up a stormy relationship with the actors wife who he believes is the cause of all the mans problems.

name: Roman Holiday
synopsis: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

name: Come Back Little Sheba
synopsis: An emotionally remote recovering alcoholic and his dowdy unambitious wife face a personal crisis when they take in an attractive lodger.

name: A Streetcar Named Desire
synopsis: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

name: Born Yesterday
synopsis: A million dollar Tycoon hires a tutor to teach his lover proper etiquette.

name: The Heiress
synopsis: A young naive woman falls for a handsome young man who her emotionally abusive father suspects is a fortune hunter.

name: Johnny Belinda
synopsis: In post-war Cape Breton a doctors efforts to tutor a deaf/mute woman are undermined when she is raped and the resulting pregnancy causes scandal to swirl.

name: The Farmer's Daughter
synopsis: Katie Holstrom leaves the farm to become a nurse but is sidetracked into domestic service romance and politics.

name: To Each His Own
synopsis: An unwed mother forced to give up her child to avoid scandal follows her sons life from afar even as she prospers in business.

name: Mildred Pierce
synopsis: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

name: Gaslight
synopsis: Years after her aunt was murdered in her home a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However he has a secret that he will do anything to protect even if it means driving his wife insane.

name: The Song of Bernadette
synopsis: In 1858 France Bernadette an adolescent peasant girl has a vision of "a beautiful lady" in the city dump. She never claims it to be anything other than this but the townspeople all ...                See full summary »

name: Mrs. Miniver
synopsis: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

name: Suspicion
synopsis: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

name: Kitty Foyle: The Natural History of a Woman
synopsis: Kitty Foyle a hard-working white-collar girl from a Philadelphia Pennsylvania low middle-class family meets and falls in love with young socialite Wyn Strafford but his family is against her.

name: Gone With the Wind
synopsis: A manipulative Southern belle carries on a turbulent affair with a blockade runner during the American Civil War.

name: Jezebel
synopsis: A haughty headstrong Southern Belle in Antebellum Louisiana loses her fiance due to her stubborn vanity and pride and vows to get him back.

name: The Good Earth
synopsis: The story of a farmer in China: a story of humility and bravery. His father gives Wang Lung a freed slave as wife. By diligence and frugality the two manage to enlarge their property. But ...                See full summary »

name: The Great Ziegfeld
synopsis: This biography follows the ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld famed producer of extravagant stage revues.

name: Dangerous
synopsis: An alcoholic actress who is considered a dangerous jinx is rehabilitated but she then shows that shes as dangerous as ever.

name: It Happened One Night
synopsis: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

name: Morning Glory
synopsis: When a naively innocent aspiring actress arrives on the Broadway scene she is taken under the wing of several theater veterans who mentor her to ultimate success.

name: The Sin of Madelon Claudet
synopsis: Out of jail for a crime she did not commit Madelon turns to prostitution and thievery to send her illegitimate son to medical school.

name: Min and Bill
synopsis: Min the owner of a dockside hotel is forced to make difficult decisions about the future of Nancy the young woman she took in as an infant.

name: The Divorcee
synopsis: When a woman discovers that her husband has been unfaithful to her she decides to respond to his infidelities in kind.

name: Coquette
synopsis: A flirtatious southern belle is compromised with one of her beaus.

name: Seventh Heaven (7th Heaven)
synopsis: A street cleaner saves a young womans life and the pair slowly fall in love until war intervenes.
